DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study evaluate safety performance AutoLap system Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy procedure .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Signed date Informed Consent Form . 2 . Patients 18 75 year age inclusive schedule elective laparoscopic Cholecystectomy procedure . 1 . Previous upper abdominal surgery contraindication Pneumoperitoneum . 2 . Pregnancy . 3 . Obesity ( BMI > 35 Kg/m2 ) . 4 . Generalized peritonitis . 5 . Septic shock cholangitis . 6 . Severe acute pancreatitis . 7 . Uncorrected coagulopathy . 8 . Previous abdominal operation prevent safe abdominal access progression procedure . 9 . Advanced cirrhosis failure hepatic function . 10 . Suspected gallbladder cancer . 11 . Acute cholecystitis 12 . Presence medical psychiatric condition condition , opinion Investigator , could affect successful participation patient study . 13 . Patient participate clinical study 60 day prior start study throughout study duration .
